snippet: With this classic custard base, the possible flavor combinations are infinite, and endlessly satisfying.
abstract: Melissa Clark A Good Appetite column shares an ice cream recipe that has an egg-rich custard base.
lead_paragraph: With this classic custard base, the possible flavor combinations are infinite, and endlessly satisfying.

headline.main: The Only Ice Cream Recipe You’ll Ever Need
headline.print_headline: A Frozen Canvas, a Spectrum of Flavors
